bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 1

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b001
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 2

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 4

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b011
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 8

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 16

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 32

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 64

bit_field_value.name: SC_PS_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Divide by 128

bit_field_value.name: SC_CLKS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: No clock selected. This in effect disables the FTM counter.

bit_field_value.name: SC_CLKS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: System clock

bit_field_value.name: SC_CLKS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Fixed frequency clock

bit_field_value.name: SC_CLKS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: External clock

bit_field_value.name: SC_CPWMS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter operates in Up Counting mode.

bit_field_value.name: SC_CPWMS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter operates in Up-Down Counting mode.

bit_field_value.name: SC_TOIE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable TOF interrupts. Use software polling.

bit_field_value.name: SC_TOIE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable TOF interrupts. An interrupt is generated when TOF equals one.

bit_field_value.name: SC_TOF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter has not overflowed.

bit_field_value.name: SC_TOF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter has overflowed.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_DMA_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable DMA transfers.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_DMA_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable DMA transfers.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_CHIE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Disable channel interrupts. Use software polling.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_CHIE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enable channel interrupts.

bit_field_value.description: No channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_CHF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: CONTROLS_DMA_0b1

bit_field.name: INIT
bit_field.description: Initial Value Of The FTM Counter

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH0F_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH0F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.description: No channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH1F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.description: No channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH2F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH3F_0b1

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH4F_0b1

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH5F_0b1

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH6F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH7F_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: STATUS_CH7F_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel event has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FTMEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: TPM compatibility. Free running counter and synchronization compatible with TPM.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FTMEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Free running counter and synchronization are different from TPM behavior.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_WPDIS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Write protection is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_WPDIS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Write protection is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_PWMSYNC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No restrictions. Software and hardware triggers can be used by MOD, CnV, OUTMASK, and FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_PWMSYNC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Software trigger can only be used by MOD and CnV synchronization, and hardware triggers can only be used by OUTMASK and FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_CAPTEST_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Capture test mode is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_CAPTEST_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Capture test mode is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTM_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Fault control is disabled for all channels.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTM_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Fault control is enabled for even channels only (channels 0, 2, 4, and 6), and the selected mode is the manual fault clearing.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTM_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Fault control is enabled for all channels, and the selected mode is the manual fault clearing.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTM_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Fault control is enabled for all channels, and the selected mode is the automatic fault clearing.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTIE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault control interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: MODE_FAULTIE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault control interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_CNTMIN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The minimum loading point is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_CNTMIN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The minimum loading point is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_CNTMAX_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The maximum loading point is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_CNTMAX_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The maximum loading point is enabled.

bit_field.name: REINIT
bit_field.description: FTM Counter Reinitialization By Synchronization (FTM counter synchronization)

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_REINIT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter continues to count normally.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_REINIT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FTM counter is updated with its initial value when the selected trigger is detected.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_SYNCHOM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: OUTMASK register is updated with the value of its buffer in all rising edges of the system clock.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_SYNCHOM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: OUTMASK register is updated with the value of its buffer only by the PWM synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG1_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG1_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG2_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_TRIG2_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Trigger is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_SWSYNC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Software trigger is not selected.

bit_field_value.name: SYNC_SWSYNC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Software trigger is selected.

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH0OI_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 0.

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH0OI_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 1.

bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 0.

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH1OI_0b1

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH3OI_0b1

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH4OI_0b1

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH5OI_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 1.

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH6OI_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 1.

bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 0.

bit_field_value.name: OUTINIT_CH7OI_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The initialization value is 1.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH0OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH0OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH1OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH1OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH2OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH3OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH4OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH4OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH5OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH5OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH6OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH6OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH7OM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is not masked. It continues to operate normally.

bit_field_value.name: OUTMASK_CH7OM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channel output is masked. It is forced to its inactive state.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMBINE0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Channels (n) and (n+1) are independent.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMBINE0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Channels (n) and (n+1) are combined.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMP0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel (n+1) output is the same as the channel (n) output.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMP0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel (n+1) output is the complement of the channel (n) output.

bit_field.name: DECAPEN0
bit_field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 0

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DECAPEN0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The Dual Edge Capture mode in this pair of channels is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DECAPEN0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The Dual Edge Capture mode in this pair of channels is enabled.

bit_field.name: DECAP0
bit_field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 0

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DECAP0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The dual edge captures are inactive.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DECAP0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The dual edge captures are active.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DTEN0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The deadtime insertion in this pair of channels is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DTEN0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The deadtime insertion in this pair of channels is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_SYNCEN0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The PWM synchronization in this pair of channels is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_SYNCEN0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The PWM synchronization in this pair of channels is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_FAULTEN0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The fault control in this pair of channels is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_FAULTEN0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The fault control in this pair of channels is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMBINE1_0b1

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_COMP1_0b1

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DECAP1_0b1

bit_field_value.name: COMBINE_DTEN1_0b1

bit_field_value.name: DEADTIME_DTPS_0b0x
bit_field_value.description: Divide the system clock by 1.

bit_field_value.name: DEADTIME_DTPS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Divide the system clock by 4.

bit_field_value.name: DEADTIME_DTPS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Divide the system clock by 16.

bit_field_value.name: EXTTRIG_CH2TRIG_0b1

bit_field_value.description: The generation of initialization trigger is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: EXTTRIG_INITTRIGEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The generation of initialization trigger is enabled.

bit_field_value.description: No channel trigger was generated.

bit_field_value.name: EXTTRIG_TRIGF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A channel trigger was generated.

bit_field_value.name: POL_POL0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The channel polarity is active high.

bit_field_value.name: POL_POL0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel polarity is active low.

bit_field_value.name: POL_POL7_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The channel polarity is active low.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF0_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF0_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF1_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF1_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF2_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF2_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF3_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF3_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A fault condition was detected at the fault input.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTIN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The logic OR of the enabled fault inputs is 0.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTIN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The logic OR of the enabled fault inputs is 1.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_WPEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Write protection is disabled. Write protected bits can be written.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_WPEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Write protection is enabled. Write protected bits cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: No fault condition was detected.

bit_field_value.name: FMS_FAULTF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A fault condition was detected.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT0EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT0EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT1EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT1EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT2EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT2EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT3EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FAULT3EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR0EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR0EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR1EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR1EN_0b1

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR2EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR2EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR3EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTCTRL_FFLTR3EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Fault input filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Quadrature Decoder mode is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Quadrature Decoder mode is enabled.

bit_field.name: TOFDIR
bit_field.description: Timer Overflow Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_TOFDIR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: TOF bit was set on the bottom of counting. There was an FTM counter decrement and FTM counter changes from its minimum value (CNTIN register) to its maximum value (MOD register).

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_TOFDIR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: TOF bit was set on the top of counting. There was an FTM counter increment and FTM counter changes from its maximum value (MOD register) to its minimum value (CNTIN register).

bit_field.name: QUADIR
bit_field.description: FTM Counter Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADIR_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Counting direction is decreasing (FTM counter decrement).

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADIR_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Counting direction is increasing (FTM counter increment).

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADMODE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Phase A and phase B encoding mode.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_QUADMODE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Count and direction encoding mode.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHBPOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal polarity. Phase B input signal is not inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHBPOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Inverted polarity. Phase B input signal is inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHAPOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Normal polarity. Phase A input signal is not inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHAPOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Inverted polarity. Phase A input signal is inverted before identifying the rising and falling edges of this signal.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHBFLTREN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Phase B input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHBFLTREN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Phase B input filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHAFLTREN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Phase A input filter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: QDCTRL_PHAFLTREN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Phase A input filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CONF_GTBEEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Use of an external global time base is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CONF_GTBEEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Use of an external global time base is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CONF_GTBEOUT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A global time base signal generation is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CONF_GTBEOUT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A global time base signal generation is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT0POL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active high. A 1 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT0POL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active low. A 0 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT1POL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active high. A 1 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT1POL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active low. A 0 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT2POL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active high. A 1 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT2POL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active low. A 0 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT3POL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active high. A 1 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: FLTPOL_FLT3POL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The fault input polarity is active low. A 0 at the fault input indicates a fault.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWTRIGMODE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FTM clears the TRIGj bit when the hardware trigger j is detected, where j = 0, 1,2.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWTRIGMODE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FTM does not clear the TRIGj bit when the hardware trigger j is detected, where j = 0, 1,2.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_CNTINC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: CNTIN register is updated with its buffer value at all rising edges of system clock.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_CNTINC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: CNTIN register is updated with its buffer value by the PWM synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_INVC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: INVCTRL register is updated with its buffer value at all rising edges of system clock.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_INVC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: INVCTRL register is updated with its buffer value by the PWM synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWOC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: SWOCTRL register is updated with its buffer value at all rising edges of system clock.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWOC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: SWOCTRL register is updated with its buffer value by the PWM synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SYNCMODE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Legacy PWM synchronization is selected.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SYNCMODE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Enhanced PWM synchronization is selected.

bit_field.name: SWRSTCNT
bit_field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWRSTCNT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger does not activate the FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWRSTCNT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger activates the FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field.name: SWWRBUF
bit_field.description: MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWWRBUF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger does not activate MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWWRBUF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger activates MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization.

bit_field.name: SWOM
bit_field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWOM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger does not activate the OUTMASK register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWOM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger activates the OUTMASK register synchronization.

bit_field.name: SWINVC
bit_field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWINVC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger does not activate the INVCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWINVC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger activates the INVCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field.name: SWSOC
bit_field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWSOC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger does not activate the SWOCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_SWSOC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The software trigger activates the SWOCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field.name: HWRSTCNT
bit_field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWRSTCNT_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWRSTCNT_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger activates the FTM counter synchronization.

bit_field.name: HWWRBUF
bit_field.description: MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWWRBUF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger does not activate MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWWRBUF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger activates MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization.

bit_field.name: HWOM
bit_field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWOM_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the OUTMASK register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWOM_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger activates the OUTMASK register synchronization.

bit_field.name: HWINVC
bit_field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWINVC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the INVCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWINVC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger activates the INVCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field.name: HWSOC
bit_field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWSOC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the SWOCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: SYNCONF_HWSOC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: A hardware trigger activates the SWOCTRL register synchronization.

bit_field_value.name: INVCTRL_INV0EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Inverting is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: INVCTRL_INV0EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Inverting is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: INVCTRL_INV1EN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Inverting is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: INVCTRL_INV1EN_0b1

bit_field_value.name: INVCTRL_INV3EN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Inverting is enabled.
